labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: it makes a sort of double blip in the audio before deafening you (May be related to the other bug I reported regarding muting yourself)
data.short_description: Deafening yourself causes a double blip in audio before you become deafened
data.steps_to_repro: - Have someone talk or read you a nice story or something without stopping (still easy to repro with a music bot) - Deafen yourself
